message.raw:
Adds copy-on-write for entities and components

Entities/Components/Queries are now constant during an update
This is a solution to adding/removing components potientially invalidating other pointers to components
It allows systems can be run in parallel without fear of segfaults.

Renamed ComponentTypeInfo::mover to copier
Added templated methods to EntityComponentDatabase for convenience
